mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET TITLE = #{title}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, SHIPPING = #{shipping}, SHIPPING_FEE = #{shippingFee}, IMAGE = #{image}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}, PRICE = #{price} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, SHIPPING, SHIPPING_FEE, IMAGE, CATEGORY_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, PRICE) VALUES (pk_sequence.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{description}, #{shipping}, #{shipping_fee}, #{image}, #{categoryId}, #{sellerId}, #{price})
